full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title**
E60HN-200ACS - Access Control Systems RFSA
E60HN-200ACS - Systèmes de contrôle d'accès DAMA

**Reference Number**
WS4332350868-Doc4332354230


**Publication Date**
June 20, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**
November 30, 2028, 14:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date**
December 1, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date**
No end date specified

**Procurement Category**
Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type**
Request for Supply Arrangement (Demande pour un arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement)

**Procurement Method**
Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Regions of Delivery**
Canada

**Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
 Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)

**Trade Agreements**
The contract will be subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
 L'arrangement sera soumis à l'Accord sur les marchés publics de l'Organisation mondiale du commerce (AMP-OMC)

**Category**
Electrical cable and accessories, Electronic component parts and raw materials and accessories, Distribution and control centers and accessories, Electrical boxes and enclosures and fittings and accessories, Electrical lugs plugs and connectors, Electrical controls and accessories, Circuit protection devices and accessories, Electrical safety devices and accessories, Electrical transmission and distribution equipment, Electrical switches and accessories, Electrical relays and accessories.

**Additional Information**

*Limited Tendering Reason*: None
*Raison Appel Offres Limite*: Aucune
Trade Agreements: *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)*, *Accord sur les marchés publics de l'Organisation mondiale du commerce (AMP-OMC)*

This announcement constitutes a Request for Supply Arrangement (RSOA) for Access Control Systems to support the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and its entities. Vendors are invited to submit a proposal for a supply arrangement to
